subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Caron Butler scored 24 points and Antawn Jamison had 23 with 15 rebounds as the Washington Wizards broke a five-game losing streak yesterday by defeating the host Atlanta Hawks, 101-90.
snippet: Caron Butler scored 24 points and Antawn Jamison had 23 with 15 rebounds as the Washington Wizards broke a five-game losing streak yesterday by defeating the host Atlanta Hawks, 101-90.
